errors.error_description: The installation instructions unnecessarily ask the user to manually install `numpy`. `numpy` is a dependency of MiV-OS and will be installed automatically by pip.
correction_candidates: Remove the line `$ pip install numpy`.
Add `scipy` to the manual installation: `$ pip install numpy scipy`.
Move the `$ pip install numpy` command after `$ pip install MiV-OS`.
Specify a version for numpy: `$ pip install numpy==1.21.0`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `$ pip install numpy`.
